summary: A private detective is hired to find a missing man by his wife. Contradictory evidence and the lack of clues soon render the case as virtually unsolvable, as the detective grows more and more frustrated.
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Etsuko Ichihara|Osamu Ôkawa|Kiyoshi Atsumi|Tamao Nakamura|Kinzô Shin|Reiko Kasahara|Hôsei Komatsu|Akiko Kudô|Aiko Nagayama|Shôjirô Ogasawara|Kyôichi Satô|Haruo Tanaka|Sakae Umezu|Hideko Yoshida
keywords: missing man|private detective|japanese new wave|private investigation|ramen noodles
title: El hombre sin mapa
